attributes.action: Exercise or democratic right to clause 50 of the Lisbon treaty
attributes.additional_details: This process of not using article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty and with the turmoil of our Governments, this will only give the UK a good chance to stay within the EU.
attributes.background: We the Voter would like to exercise our democratic right to clause 50 of the Lisbon Treaty with immediate affect.  In this process we will benefit from leaving early with less chance of the process dragging on and allowing us to be part of the Eu in the future.
